Mr, George Jennings
•2*
February 18, I960
If you have any questions about this project, you know they are
always welcome* We are most anxious to get the project underway and
if you can do anything to help this request in the front office, we
would appreciate your efforts.
Sincerely,
Clair R* Tettemer
Chairman NAEB Television
Utilisation Subcommittee

p, S* To Liz: Gail Atkins is Chairman of the Utilization Committee*
George Johnson is Chairman of Radio Subcommittee of the Utiliza¬
tion Committee. I am Chairman of the Television Subcommittee
of the Utilization Committee. In addition to being Chairman,
of this Subcommittee, I am organizing the Utilization Information
Kit Project. This is being thought of as a joint Radio and TV
Project. Maybe the above will help straighten out some of the
confusion*
Regards,
Clair
